== Acer Aspire One D150 ==

All the basics functionalities work on Ubuntu 10.04 LTS:
* Screen
* Keyboard
* Touchpad
* Wireless internet
* Wired internet
* Audio
* Microphone
* USB mouse
* Webcam
* Suspend/Resume

See the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Laptop/Lucid/Reports/AcerAspireOneD150#Post-install%20fixes|Post-install fixes]]</nowiki> for the wireless firmware installation.
